titleStmt.title: Articles agreed on by the bishoppes, and other learned menne in the synode at London, in the yere of our Lorde Godde, M.D.LII. for the auoiding of controuersie in opinions, and the establishement of a godlie concorde, in certeine matiers of religion.
Forty-two Articles
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Richardus Craftonus [sic] typographus Regius excudebat. Londini,

notesStmt.note: Another issue of STC 10034, partially reset.
At foot of title page: Published by the kinges Maiesties commaundement, in the moneth of Maie. Anno Domini. 1553.
Identified as STC 10034 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library (New York, N.Y.).
